trans-unit.source: A class implementing this interface notifies you when an object is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的类可在释放对象时通知你。

trans-unit.source: After an object is disposed, it can no longer be used.
trans-unit.target: 释放对象后，可以不再使用。

trans-unit.source: Any call to its methods or properties will result in a <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> error.
trans-unit.target: 对其方法或属性的任何调用将导致<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>错误。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is disposed.
After an object is disposed, any call to its properties or methods will throw an <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> error.
trans-unit.target: 释放对象后，将引发对其属性或方法的任何调用<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>错误。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used to remove a reference to the object that was just disposed.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可以用于移除对刚释放的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Accessing any object member in this event will throw the <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>.
trans-unit.target: 访问此事件中的任何对象成员将引发<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>。

trans-unit.source: If you need to unsubscribe from events or access any other object member, consider using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposing.Disposing> event if it is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要取消订阅事件或访问任何其他对象成员，请考虑使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposing.Disposing>事件是否可用。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the an object is disposed.
<see langword="True" /> if the object is disposed; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 如果释放该对象;<see langword="false" />否则为。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to check this property even after object is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 则可以安全地释放对象后，即使检查此属性。

trans-unit.source: If a class implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, then the `PropertyChanged` event will be raised for this property when the object becomes disposed.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个类实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>，则`PropertyChanged`变得释放此对象时，将此属性引发事件。
